summary.para: Creates a media keys object based on the specified key system.

param.name: cdmStorePath
param.para: Points to a location to store Content Decryption Module (CDM) data which might be locked by multiple process and so might be incompatible with store app suspension.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Checks if keySystem is a supported key system and creates the related Content Decryption Module (CDM).

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: This parameter is reserved and must be set to 0.

param.name: pAttr
param.para: This method supports the following Media Foundation attributes:

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a value that indicates if the specified key system supports the specified media type.

param.name: type
param.para: The MIME type to check support for.

param.name: keySystem
param.para: The key system to check support for.

param.name: isSupported
param.para: true if type is supported by keySystem; otherwise, false.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: This class is implemented by the Media Engine (CLSID_MFMediaEngineClassFactory).
